title: When did old school philosophy stop being science? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am going to say with the definition. As soon as philosophy came up with the definition of science and the scientific method, that was it. Francis Bacon was the first to formalize the concept of a true scientific method, but it took a while to get traction. I think what you are asking is when did science beat old school philosophy, that is hard to say, it was a gradual process. You could say it still isn’t here 100 percent. We have flat earthers, we have fake science, we have people hugging trees and doing all sorts of strange things for “energy”.
